title: Learn React Hooks
desc: Master the fundamentals of React Hooks including useState, useEffect, and custom hooks
execution: Read React documentation on hooks, build a practice app with useState and useEffect
reflectionPrompts: What was the most challenging hook to understand?
How do hooks change the way you think about component state?
What real-world scenario would benefit from a custom hook?

title: Build Todo App with TypeScript
desc: Create a full-featured todo application using React and TypeScript
execution: Set up TypeScript project, implement CRUD operations, add local storage
reflectionPrompts: What TypeScript features helped catch errors early?
How did type safety improve your development experience?
What would you do differently in the next iteration?

title: Understand Machine Learning Basics
desc: Learn fundamental concepts of machine learning and data science
execution: Complete online course on ML basics, practice with scikit-learn
reflectionPrompts: What surprised you most about how ML algorithms work?
How do you see ML applying to your current field?
What's the difference between supervised and unsupervised learning?

title: Practice Algorithm Problems
desc: Solve coding challenges to improve problem-solving skills
execution: Solve 5 problems on LeetCode, focus on array and string manipulation

notes.text: Completed first 5 problems, focusing on two-pointer technique

title: Learn Docker Containerization
desc: Understand containerization concepts and Docker best practices
execution: Follow Docker tutorial, containerize a simple web app
reflectionPrompts: How do containers solve the 'it works on my machine' problem?
What are the key differences between containers and VMs?
When would you choose Docker over other deployment methods?
